Dark One/Scavenger:



Dark One chuckled, rolling out of the way of shots, one nearly hitting his 
"fuel tank", speeding away so he could turn around.  "How easy it is in this 
form to dodge laser blasts at my speed.  SO EASY!" he laughed manically.

---

Scavenger swerved, firing twenty shells at Ursa Major, going at 60 MPH 
straight for her.
